titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the Dan Throop Smith papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Hoover Institution Archives Staff

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2018-04-12T14:45-0700

change.item: data cleanup via script: updated the author of the finding aid; removed tags from languageOfFindingAid; added catkey; added OAC url; updated Prefered Citation; updated Accruals statement
Revised to update encoding and add unitid
PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Dan Throop Smith Papers.)//EN" "reg_363.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

did.abstract: Speeches and writings, correspondence, minutes, reports, memoranda, notes, clippings, and other printed matter, relating primarily to tax policy in the U.S.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The remainder of the collection is open for research; materials must be requested at least two business days in advance of intended use.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Dan Throop Smith papers, [Box no., Folder no. or title], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1973.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at https://searchworks.stanford.edu . Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.
